task.title: Creating a segment from the full results of a path report

context.p: You can create a customer segment from the customers represented in the results of a path report.

step.cmd: Click the Report status menu in the top navigation bar.
Select the report that you want to open.
On the Channel summary or Expanded view page, click Menu at the top of the report.
Enter a name for the segment.

taskbody.result: The new segment is available from the Segments menu on the Path analysis page when you create a path report.
